product_meta.title: Epson WorkForce WF-100W Portable Wi-Fi Printer- Black
product_meta.description:
Cut the cables and print on the go with the WorkForce WF-100. Measuring 309x154x61mm and weighing just 1.6kg, the WF-100 is Epson's smallest and lightest wireless A4 inkjet printer. The printer also comes equipped with a built-in battery that can be recharged anywhere via USB.

Hassle-free wireless connectivity and compatibility to Apple AirPrint and Google Cloud Print, the WF-100 allows you to print from anywhere at any time, whether you are at the office or on your morning commute. The WF-100W also benefits from Epson Connect. Whilst the Epson iPrint app allows for wireless printing from most tablets or smartphones, Epson Connect also includes Email Print. With Email Print, you can now print from anywhere in the world.

As the only portable printer that currently uses pigment inks for all colours, the WorkForce WF-100’s quality is reflected in the clear, durable and smudge-free prints.

The WF-100W prints at a speed of up to 7ppm in black and white and 4ppm in colour. With an ink yield of up to 250 pages* and 3.7cm LCD screen, the WF-100 is easy to set up without the need for a PC and is ready to go whenever you need it.

*based on black and white printing, colour print yields 200 pages



BOX CONTAINS
Epson Printer
AC Adapter
Mini USB Cable
2x Maintenance Box
Black Ink Cartridge
Tri-Colour Ink Cartridge
User Documentation
feature_bullets: Rechargeable battery - plug into any USB port or recharge with the bundled AC adapter
Wi-Fi and Wi-Fi Direct - print wherever you are without cables
Quality - pigment inks ensure improved results. User friendly - hassle-free with simple set-up, Lightweight, compact design

Compatible operating system are mac os x 10.6.8 or later, windows 10, windows 7, windows 8, windows 8.1, windows server 2003 32/64 bit, windows server 2008 32/64 bit, windows server 2008 r2, windows server 2012 64 bit, windows server 2012 r2, windows vista and windows server 2003 r2
